Name: Hang Up
About the game: Shadow Factory's entry to the 2018 Global Game Jam is now ready to play this Halloween Season. Players find themselves in a small room with a telephone switchboard. They must complete the correct cord circuits to connect calls. In doing so they can listen in on the different conversations and uncover the unsettling secrets that make up a larger mystery. The virtual reality horror-thriller is playable on the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
Meta Title: Hang Up: Oct 16, 2018, Shadow Factory and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hang Up? Check out the release date (Oct 16, 2018), developer insights from Shadow Factory, and a complete game summary.
